title: Development of an eco-friendly capillary electrophoresis method for the simultaneous determination of piperacillin, tazobactam and ibuprofen in plasma samples: application to a pharmacokinetic study in rats
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,23378-23391
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04615C, Paper

Weam M. Othman, Nourah Z. Al-Zoman, Ibrahim A. Darwish, Aliyah Almomen, Samah S. Saad, Fatma F. Abdallah, Nehal F. Farid
Piperacillin (PIP) and tazobactam (TAZ) are broad-spectrum beta-lactam antimicrobial agents, which are frequently co-prescribed in intensive care units (ICUs) worldwide.
